snippet: Lalu Prasad, a once-powerful political leader from northern India, emerged from jail on Monday after spending more than two months behind bars on corruption charges.
abstract: Lalu Prasas, once-powerful political leader from Northern India, emerges from jail on bail after spending more than two months behind bars on corruption charges.
lead_paragraph: Lalu Prasad, a once-powerful political leader from northern India, emerged from jail on Monday after spending more than two months behind bars on corruption charges.
